original_title: Joe Bonamassa - Now Serving Royal Tea Live from the Ryman
overview: Last year when COVID-19 put the live touring industry on hold, guitar hero Joe Bonamassa did something unprecedented for his fans, he put together a one night only show at the iconic Ryman Auditorium in Nashville, TN to be live streamed for fans everywhere. That night he united people across 44 countries worldwide for a phenomenal live music presentation of his brand new album “Royal Tea” before it was even released.
tagline: With impressive production and great sound, blues rock guitar master Joe Bonamassa and the band pulled off a top tier show!
title: Joe Bonamassa - Now Serving Royal Tea Live from the Ryman
